original_text: These six were born unto him in Hebron; and there he reigned seven years and six months: and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty and three years.
korean_text: 이 여섯은 헤브론에서 낳았더라 다윗이 거기서 칠 년 육 개월 다스렸고 또 예루살렘에서 삼십삼 년 다스렸으며

sentences.original_text: These six were born unto him in Hebron;
sentences.korean_translation: 이 여섯 아들이 헤브론에서 그에게 태어났고

sentences.original_text: and there he reigned seven years and six months:
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 그는 칠 년 육 개월 동안 다스렸으며

sentences.original_text: and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty and three years.
